#define ll long long
#define pr(a) printf("%d\n",a);
#define sc1(a) scanf("%d",&a);
#define mod 1000000007
#define sc2(a,b) scanf("%d%d",&a,&b);
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define pb push_back
using namespace std;
vector<int>g[100100];
ll int dp[100009],dp1[1000009];
void dfs(int n,int p=-1)
{
	dp[n]=1;
//	dp1[n]=1;
	for(int i=0;i!=g[n].size();i++)
	{
		if(g[n][i] != p)
		{
			dfs(g[n][i],n);
			dp[n] = (dp[n] *((1+dp[g[n][i]])%mod))%mod;
			dp1[n]=(dp1[n]+(dp[g[n][i]]+dp1[g[n][i]])%mod)%mod;
		}
	}
}
int main(){
int t;
scanf("%d",&t);
int v,x,y,i;
	while(t--)
	{
		
	scanf("%d",&v);
	memset(dp,0,sizeof(dp));
	memset(dp1,0,sizeof(dp1));
		for(int i=0;i != v-1;i++)
		{
		scanf("%d %d", &x , &y);
		g[x].push_back(y);
		g[y].push_back(x);
		}
	dfs(1);
	for(i=1;i<=v;i++)
	g[i].clear();
	printf("%lld\n",(dp[1]+dp1[1])%mod);
	}
return 0;
}
